name: lia-script
description: An extended Markdown parser for the creation of online courses.

scripts.init: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp node_modules/katex/dist/katex.min.css dist/
scripts.build:app: npm run init && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url ./ src/entry/app/index.html && npm run sw
scripts.watch:app: npm run init && npx parcel serve src/entry/app/index.html
scripts.build:base: npm run init && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url ./ src/entry/base/index.html
scripts.watch:base: npm run init && npx parcel serve src/entry/base/index.html
scripts.build:scorm1.2: npm run init && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url ./ src/entry/scorm1.2/index.html
scripts.watch:scorm1.2: npm run init && npx parcel serve src/entry/scorm1.2/index.html
